Serialized Form

  • Package mangan

    • Class mangan.Coordinates extends java.awt.Point implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • x

          double x
          x value of the Coordinates.

        • y

          double y
          y value of the Coordinates.

        • Vx

          double Vx
          x values of the velocity of these Coordinates.

        • Vy

          double Vy
          y values of the velocity of these Coordinates.

    • Class mangan.RobotHasNoNeighborException extends java.lang.Exception implements Serializable

    • Class mangan.Visualisation extends processing.core.PApplet implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • cp5

          controlP5.ControlP5 cp5
          ControlP5 instance.

        • menuRadioButton

          controlP5.RadioButton menuRadioButton
          ControlP5 radio button which represents the deployment methods.

        • totalMangan

          controlP5.Textlabel totalMangan
          ControlP5 text field which represents the label for the total amount of mangan.

        • totalDistance

          controlP5.Textlabel totalDistance
          ControlP5 text field which represents the label for the total distance traveld by all robots.

        • totalRobots

          controlP5.Textlabel totalRobots
          ControlP5 text field which represents the label for the total amount of robots currently deployed.

        • Robots

          java.lang.String Robots
          Placeholder to make ControlP5 Textfield use a string value.

        • RobotsTF

          controlP5.Textfield RobotsTF
          Placeholder to access ControlP5 Textfield itself.

        • ViewingRange

          java.lang.String ViewingRange
          Placeholder to make ControlP5 Textfield use a String value.

          Placeholder to access ControlP5 Textfield itself.

          Placeholder to access ControlP5 Textfield itself.

        • linespacing

          int linespacing
          Line spacing for the grid to be drawn as the playground.

        • amountOfRobots

          int amountOfRobots
          Initial amount of robots for the ControlP5 slider.

        • distanceBetweenRobots

          int distanceBetweenRobots
          Initial distance value for the ControlP5 slider.

        • manual

          boolean manual
          A boolean to check if the user wants to run in manual mode.

        • all

          boolean all
          A boolean to check if the user wants to run batch mode.

        • start

          boolean start
          A boolean to check if the visualization should draw the movement of the robots and also trigger the movement of the simulator.

        • start2

          boolean start2
          A boolean helper for batch mode.

        • robots

          java.util.HashMap<K,V> robots
          A listing of all drawn robots, similar to the HashMaps in the simulator to keep track of the order of the robots.

        • f

          processing.core.PFont f
          A Processing font object to store the desired font.

        • menuWidth

          int menuWidth
          The size of the menu entries on the x axis.

        • menuHeight

          int menuHeight
          The height of the menu entries on the y axis.

        • menuBorder

          int menuBorder
          The size of the sidebar menu. Not initiated with the values because the "width" isn't available at this time of the initiation.

        • menuElementPos

          int menuElementPos
          The position of the menu Elements of the sidebar menu. Not initiated with the values because the "width" isn't available at this time of the initiation.

        • mode

          int mode
          variable for iterating over all modes
